General.Name: Perk Labs Inc
General.Description: Perk Labs Inc. owns and operates an online ordering, payments, and loyalty platform in Canada. It offers Perk Hero, an online marketplace that connects consumers with restaurants and digital gift cards. The company was formerly known as Glance Technologies Inc. Perk Labs Inc. was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 555 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7X 1M9
